description: This file defines a Flutter widget for editing or creating notes, including form fields for note title, content, and category, with save and cancel functionalities.

classes.name: NoteEditPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget for editing or creating a note

classes.name: _NoteEditPageState
classes.description: State class managing form and logic for NoteEditPage

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the form with existing note data if available

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of TextEditingControllers to free resources

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates the form, saves the note via provider, and navigates back

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI including form fields, app bar, and action buttons
